description: Silver-tone stainless steel case with a black rubber strap. Silver-tone stainless steel bezel. Black dial with luminous white hands and dots-dots hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Day of the week and date display at the 3 o'clock position. Automatic movement with a 45-hour power reserve. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Round case shape, case size: 42 mm, case thickness: 12 mm. Band width: 20 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 200 meters / 660 feet

feedbacks.author: John Lemon
feedbacks.comment: Imagine all the watches, living in conFusion!

feedbacks.author: Paul McVites
feedbacks.comment: Sends anyone to heaven, I wish I could get my mother-in-law to use it!

feedbacks.author: 25 Cent
feedbacks.comment: It's your birthday, we're gonna party!

watchName: Promaster Sea Automatic Black Dial Men's Watch
